text: 1.4 2 Ko 7.4, 7.14, 1 Te 2.19, Lep 1.9 Klays nop gos nɨgem, binɨb ogɨnap nɨbop gɨ tɨmel gel koslam mɨdebɨm ak pen, gos anɨb ak ma nɨŋɨd, nop gos kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl lɨnɨgɨlɨg mɨdebɨm. Anɨb ak binɨb ogɨnap God yɨl mɨdebal man keke okok, kɨlop pel apun, Tesalonayka binɨb anɨgɨpal, yɨb kɨlop dad aplanɨgun apun.
